Row.Text: Captain Skipper. Once again, please lead our fearless penguin soldiers for glory and pride of Antarctica. Your remarkable leadership has never failed the penguins and they are looking up to you, Captain Skipper.

+1 [ICON_FOOD] Food and +1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production from Snow tiles. Units receive +5 [ICON_STRENGTH] Combat Strength in their home continent and ignore additional [ICON_MOVEMENT] Movement costs from embarking and disembarking.
+2 Influence points per turn. Can enter City-States' territory freely. Build the Encampment District in half the time.
Replaces Infantry. Ignores terrains and rivers. +5 more [ICON_STRENGTH] Combat Strength than Infantry. -2 [ICON_GOLD] less maintenance.

Can only be constructed on Snow or Tundra tiles. Cannot be constructed adjacent to another Penguin's Nest. +1 [ICON_FOOD] Food and [ICON_CULTURE] Culture and +1 [ICON_HOUSING] Housing. +1 additional [ICON_FOOD] if adjacent to Fishing Boats. +1 additional Food with Exploration Civic.
Penguins are so cute they can ignore terrains.
They are fond of water, so they can ignore rivers.
